snippet: Hope is fading fast for a ban on the type of bullet-spraying assault rifle that took the lives of 20 children at the Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn.
abstract: Francis X Clines Editorial Observer documents way in which Newtown, Conn, is still reeling from mass shooting at Sandy Hook Elementary School, even as hopes for new gun control legislation fade.
lead_paragraph: Hope is fading fast for a ban on the type of bullet-spraying assault rifle that took the lives of 20 children at the Sandy Hook Elementary School in Newtown, Conn.

headline.print_headline: Main Street Gets the Gun News From Washington
headline.seo: Newtown, Conn., Gets the Gun News From Washington
headline.main: Main Street Gets the Gun News From Washington
